# Repository Description

Real-Time Financial Nowcasting Platform - Multi-model ensemble ML system for market predictions

## Live Demo
https://nowcasting-platform.pages.dev

## Features
- Real-time predictions with FinBERT, XGBoost, and DNN ensemble
- Dynamic time-series visualization (1m to 1M horizons)
- Professional wine & gold UI design
- 67.8% directional accuracy
- 47ms inference latency
